content.raw: by setting the ODE step size to 0.01 and running at  100hz , the simulation is not working, now it works with 2000hz. I think it is not possible to control the robots movement precisely with 100hz. I have already spend a lot of time in tuning the ODE and PID parameters to perform movements similar to Simspark. but still , I think it is possible to control the robot with lower gain and effect size and arrange the simulator to work with 1000hz.
